product_title: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Core i3-1215U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GBM.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-1215U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It has 8GB DDR4 (OnBoard). The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth® 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 has many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 7520U (2.8 GHz up to 4.3 GHz, 4 Cores, 8 Threads) RAM: 8GB LPDDR5 Storage: 512GB PCIe 3.0 SSD Display: 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) Anti-glare Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics Operating System: Windows 11 Home Battery: 3-cell Li-ion, 42WHrs Ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2x USB 2.0 Type-A, 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in Weight: 1.63 kg Color: Mixed Black The ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1472 is an ideal laptop for productivity and entertainment on the go. It features the powerful AMD Ryzen 5 7520U processor, capable of handling demanding multitasking with ease, together with 8GB of fast LPDDR5 RAM for smooth performance. Storage is both fast and ample, thanks to a 512GB PCIe 3.0 SSD which ensures quick system boot and sufficient space for your files and applications. The laptop sports a 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display that delivers crisp visuals and comfortable viewing even in bright conditions. Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics provide dependable visual performance for daily computing needs. With a lightweight design at just 1.63 kg and a stylish Mixed Black finish, this device is perfect for carrying to work or school. Connectivity is comprehensive, featuring a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, USB 2.0 ports, HDMI 1.4, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack, enabling easy connection to peripherals and external displays.

details.description_text: Additional Information Brand Dell Model Dell Inspiron 15-3576 Processor Intel Core i3 8130U Clock Speed 2.2-3.4GHz Cache 4MB Display Type HD LED Display Size 15.6" Display Resolution 1366x768 (WxH) HD Touch No RAM type DDR4 2400MHz RAM 4GB Storage 1TB HDD Graphics chipset Intel UHD Graphics 620 Graphics memory Shared Optical device DVD RW Networking LAN, WiFi, Bluetooth, Card Reader, WebCam Display port HDMI Audio port Combo USB Port 2 x USB3.1 Gen 1, 1 x USB2.0 Battery 4 Cell Weight 2.13Kg Color Fog Gray Operating System Free-Dos Warranty 2 year (Battery, Adapter 1 year) Details Dell Inspiron 15-3576 What you need. For all you do. Dell Inspiron 15-3576(15) laptop with essentials you need and more, including the latest Intel Processors, CinemaStream and CinemaSound. Features you can count on to power your day. Dynamite processing power:Intel Core i3 Processors deliver longer battery life, incredible responsiveness and smooth, seamless multitasking. Speed for everything:With support for to 4GB of memory, you can run multiple applications simultaneously and still enjoy responsive performance on your system. Graphically superior:Graphics options let you edit quickly and give your performance an extra boost. Solid performer:Get quicker load times, better shock resistance and longer battery life from an optional solid-state drive. Designed for the real world We want you to love your new PC for years to come. That's why we test Inspiron laptops for reliability not just in the places where you expect it, but for the open road ahead. Turn up the heat:From locker rooms to locked cars, we test Inspiron laptops for survival in harsh short-term heat conditions of up to 65°C/149°F. Everything hinges on it:We test Inspiron laptop hinges to ensure they still feel tight, even after opening and closing the lid 20,000 times. Keys to success:We test commonly used keys for 10 million keystrokes and touch pad buttons 1 million times with no failure. So go ahead, finish your novel. Buttoned up:No matter what you set your power and multimedia buttons to do, we've tested them all to survive up to 40,000 pushes with no problems. Twist and turn:Call us excessive, but after twisting an Inspiron laptop's base and lid more than 25,000 times, we can assure you the parts inside are well protected. In for the long haul:System undergo at least 10,000 hours of highly accelerated life to ensure it's ready for the real world Model - Dell Inspiron 15-3576, Processor - Intel Core i3 8130U, Generation - 8th Gen, Processor Clock Speed - 2.2-3.4GHz, CPU Cache - 4MB, Display Size - 15.6", Display Type - HD LED Display, Display Resolution - 1366 x 768, RAM - 4GB, RAM Type - DDR4 2400MHz, Storage - 1TB HDD, Graphics Chipset - Intel UHD Graphics 620, Graphics Memory - Shared, Optical Device - DVD RW, Networking - LAN, WiFi, Bluetooth, Card Reader, WebCam, Display Port - HDMI, Audio Port - Combo, USB Port - 2 x USB3.1 Gen 1, 1 x USB2.0, Battery - 4 Cell, Operating System - Free Dos, Weight - 2.13Kg, Color - Fog Grey, Part No - TURIS15MLK1901143CP, Warranty - 2 year (Battery, Adapter 1 year)

product_title: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504FA-BQ371W AMD Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

detail.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504FA-BQ371W AMD Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 7320U (Up to 4.1 GHz, 4 Cores) RAM: 8GB LPDDR5 Storage: 512GB PCIe Gen3 SSD Display: 15.6-inch FHD (1920 x 1080), Anti-glare Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics Operating System: Windows 11 Home Battery: 42WHrs, 3-cell Li-ion Ports: USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, USB 2.0, HDMI 1.4, 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, DC-in Weight: 1.63 kg Color: Mixed Black The ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504FA-BQ371W is designed for students and professionals seeking a reliable, stylish, and portable laptop. Powered by the efficient AMD Ryzen 3 7320U processor and 8GB LPDDR5 RAM, this laptop delivers smooth multitasking and productivity performance for daily tasks and light multimedia use. Its fast 512GB PCIe Gen3 SSD ensures quick boot times and ample storage for your files and applications. The 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display provides vibrant visuals, making it perfect for both work and entertainment. Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics handle casual graphics needs effortlessly. With a slim 1.63 kg chassis and a sleek Mixed Black finish, the Vivobook Go 15 is highly portable and stylish. A wide array of I/O ports including USB Type-C, HDMI, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack ensure versatile connectivity for all your devices. Preloaded with Windows 11 Home and backed by ASUS's build quality, this laptop is an ideal choice for those who value performance and mobility.

product_title: Chuwi HeroBook Plus15.6"IPS | Intel N4020 | 8GB RAM+256GB SSD

detail.name: Chuwi HeroBook Plus15.6"IPS | Intel N4020 | 8GB RAM+256GB SSD

details.description_text: Here are the highlights of the Chuwi HeroBook Plus:Large Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with vibrant colors and wide viewing angles. Powerful Performance: Intel Celeron N4020 processor (2 cores, up to 2.8 GHz) with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM for smooth multitasking. Fast Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD for quick boot times and plenty of storage for files and apps. Portable Design: Lightweight (1.6 kg) and slim (12mm), making it easy to carry around. Long Battery Life: 38Wh battery providing up to 8 hours of usage on a single charge. Windows 11: Pre-installed for a modern, user-friendly experience. Ample Connectivity: Dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, and multiple ports (USB 3.0, Type-C, HDMI, and more) for flexible device connections. Affordable Price: Great value for everyday computing needs. Chuwi HeroBook Plus – 15.6" FHD LaptopThe Chuwi HeroBook Plus is a lightweight and budget-friendly laptop designed to meet the needs of students, professionals, and everyday users. It combines a large display, efficient performance, and essential connectivity features in a sleek, portable form factor.Key SpecificationsDisplay: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 230 nits brightness, offering vibrant visuals and wide viewing angles.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (2 cores, 2 threads) with a base frequency of 1.1 GHz and a turbo boost up to 2.8 GHz, providing efficient performance for everyday tasks.Graphics: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600, suitable for light multimedia consumption and casual gaming.Memory: 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, facilitating smooth multitasking and responsiveness.Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD, offering fast boot times and ample space for documents, applications, and media files.Battery: 38Wh Li-ion battery with up to 8 hours of usage and rapid charging capabilities.Operating System: Windows 11, providing a modern and user-friendly interface.Design & BuildWeighing approximately 1.6 kg and measuring just 12mm in thickness, the HeroBook Plus is designed for portability without compromising on durability. Its polycarbonate body ensures resistance to heat and impact, making it an ideal companion for students and professionals on the go.Connectivity & PortsWi-Fi: Dual-band 2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi 802.11a/ac/b/g/n for fast and stable internet connections.Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.2 for connecting peripherals and accessories.Ports:2 x USB 3.0 ports1 x USB 2.0 port1 x USB Type-C port1 x HDMI 1.4 port1 x 3.5mm audio jack1 x RJ45 LAN port1 x TF card readerThese ports ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices and peripherals.Additional FeaturesKeyboard: Full-sized chiclet keyboard with a large 6.57" touchpad for comfortable typing and navigation.Webcam: 2MP front-facing camera with a physical privacy shutter for secure video conferencing.Audio: Integrated speakers and dual microphones for clear audio during calls and media playback.
